"Stellar Gift Collection": "Defeat the nearby enemies and collect the Stellar Gift!"

"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_000 We've got a visual on something falling from the sky!
Be careful, it'll impact close by!"
"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_007 We aren't detecting any more enemies in the area. Please retrieve the Stellar Gift."

"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_072 We weren't able to make it in time.
Leave the area, this collection was a failure."

"あっ……、ステラーギフト。
でも、いつものとなにか違う……かも？"

"いいものが入ってる……かな？
エネミー倒して、開けてみてください。"

"エネミー……倒せたみたいですね。
ステラーギフトの回収、忘れずに。"

"プロテクト解除、間に合わなかったみたいですね。
ドンマイ……です。"
